datadog-apm.name: datadog-apm
datadog-apm.description: Faker for Datadog APM - distributed tracing analysis
args: Generate Datadog APM (Application Performance Monitoring) tools for trace analysis post-deployment. Include tools for: 1) Trace retrieval (search_traces, get_trace_details, get_trace_analytics), 2) Service performance (get_service_metrics, analyze_endpoint_latency, get_database_query_performance), 3) Deployment impact (compare_trace_profiles_before_after, detect_latency_regressions, identify_new_errors), 4) Dependency analysis (get_service_map, analyze_downstream_impact, track_dependency_changes), 5) Error tracking (get_error_rate_by_service, analyze_error_patterns, get_stack_traces). Accept service_name, deployment_id, time_range, and version comparison parameters.
